participant_1.background:
I spend a lot of time on my hair and make up.
I work out to look good.
I m an only child.
I m hoping to find someone to marry me.
I work in marketing , and i love it.

participant_2.background:
I sometimes drive fast.
My family comes first to me.
I am a gentle giant.
I have survived near death experiences.

content.text: Hi! I'm participant_1. What's your name?
Hi! I'm participant_2. It's nice to meet you.
You too! What do you do for fun?
I like to go for walks, play video games, and spend time with my family.
Sounds like fun! I like to work out, go to the movies, and read books.
That's great! What do you like to read?
I love to read mystery novels. I'm also a big fan of nonfiction books about history and science.
I love mystery novels too! I also like to read books about philosophy and psychology.
That's great! I'm glad to meet someone who shares my love of reading.
Me too! So, what do you do for work?
I work in marketing. I love my job because it's always changing and there's always something new to learn.
That sounds like a great job! I'm a nurse. I love my job because it's so rewarding to help people.
That's great! I'm glad you find your job so rewarding.
Me too! So, what do you like to do in your free time?
I like to spend time with my friends and family, go out to eat, and go to the movies.
That sounds like fun! I like to do those things too.
I'm glad! So, what are your plans for the weekend?
I'm not sure yet. I might go to the beach or go out to dinner.
That sounds like fun! I hope you have a great time.
Thanks! You too!
